name: Waste Unit Specialist
description:
A lonely voyage through space. A heart-wrenching view of dying Earth behind and the dusty surface of Mars ahead. 

Amidst your journey, you face an encounter that forces you to direct your gaze inwards.

This Visual Novel was created for O2A2 that ran from July 23rd until July 30th.

Credits:

Programming, Music, Writing & Editing: Acta

Art: Arakachi

Story & Writing: anigvit
